summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Jam Sholat Digital KHGT app. Fixed critical infinite loop bug in TVDisplay.jsx. All key features working: Kalibrasi menu, Bunyi Notifikasi toggles, countdown system, sidebar floating bar fix, admin login, prayer times API.
passed_tests: Login with admin/admin123 credentials works correctly
Kalibrasi menu appears in sidebar and is clickable
Kalibrasi page shows calibration settings for all 5 prayer times (Subuh, Dzuhur, Ashar, Maghrib, Isya)
Bunyi Notifikasi tab shows 4 sound toggle switches (pre-adzan, adzan, pre-iqamah, iqamah)
All sound toggles are functional (can be turned ON/OFF)
Floating bar sidebar bug FIXED - user info at bottom doesn't overlap with menu items
TV Display shows all prayer times correctly (KHGT schedule)
Countdown timer working with mode switching (adzan/jeda_adzan/iqomah)
API /api/prayer-times returns KHGT prayer times for Feb 2026
API /api/settings/prayer returns calibration settings with all fields
Hijri calendar shows correct date (3 Ramadan 1447 H for Feb 19 2026)

bugs_fixed_by_tester.issue: Maximum update depth exceeded - Infinite loop in useEffect
bugs_fixed_by_tester.cause: soundsPlayed was in useEffect dependency array while being modified within the effect
bugs_fixed_by_tester.fix: Removed soundsPlayed from dependencies, used callback pattern for state updates to avoid stale closures

critical_code_review_comments: TVDisplay.jsx: Infinite loop bug was caused by soundsPlayed being in useEffect deps while being modified - FIXED
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Kalibrasi page has two tabs: 'Kalibrasi per Waktu' and 'Bunyi Notifikasi'. Each prayer time has 4 calibration fields: pre_adzan, jeda_adzan, pre_iqamah, jeda_sholat. Sound notification toggles are: sound_pre_adzan, sound_adzan, sound_pre_iqamah, sound_iqamah. Fixed infinite loop bug in TVDisplay countdown useEffect.
